tsConfig.description: Path to project's TypeScript configuration file. (default: `<projectRoot>/tsconfig.json`)

outputPath.description: The output path of the generated files. (default: `dist/compodoc/<projectName>`)

exportFormat.description: Format of generated documentation. (html, json - enables Compodoc's `minimal` mode as well)

workspaceDocs.description: Use readme of workspace root as entry and add the readme files of all project as additional documentation.

name.description: Title of the documentation. (`workspaceDocs` uses workspace name as default - defined in `package.json`)

includes.description: Path to external markdown files, folder should contain a summary.json. (`workspaceDocs` will override this)

includesName.description: Name of menu item containing external markdown files. (workspaceDocs uses "Projects" as default)

disableCoverage.description: Do not add the documentation coverage report.

disableSourceCode.description: Do not add source code tab and links to source code.

disableDomTree.description: Do not add dom tree tab.

disableGraph.description: Disable rendering of the dependency graph.

disablePrivate.description: Do not show private in generated documentation.

disableProtected.description: Do not show protected in generated documentation.

disableInternal.description: Do not show @internal in generated documentation.

disableLifeCycleHooks.description: Do not show Angular lifecycle hooks in generated documentation.

disableRoutesGraph.description: Do not add the routes graph.

disableSearch.description: Do not add the search input.

disableDependencies.description: Do not add the dependencies list.

hideGenerator.description: Do not print the Compodoc logo at the bottom of the page.

templates.description: Path to directory of Handlebars templates to override built-in templates.

assetsFolder.description: External assets folder to copy in generated documentation folder.

unitTestCoverage.description: Path to unit test coverage in json-summary format.

watch.description: Watch for source files changes to automatically rebuild documentation.
